Summary: I was walking across the golf course and observed a ufo.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe starlike object was moving in a north west direction. The object was dim and hard to see. The object moved in a straight line at a slow steady speed and then vanished or seemed to dim out. I was walking my dog across the golf course as I do every night between 8pm to about 8:30 pm. I was looking for it (star-like objects)as they are a common occurance in this area. I picked up the hobby of star gazing about a year ago, bought a telescope. It was at that time that my girlfriend observed the star-like objects and pointed them out to me. It's been my hobby ever since then. My feelings are that I know that the star like objects are ufo's and that they are piloted by life more advanced than ours. I was airforce and now I am a retired peace officer. We are not alone lol. Ufo's are cool.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Yuma
There were no other sightings in Yuma on or around May 13th 2009
